mapper.insert: INSERT INTO auction (PNUM, PNAME, PRICE, prompt, SUBJECT, CONTENT, PASS, FILE1, BOARDID, REGDATE, READCNT, USERID, BUY, BUYID,IDATE) VALUES (boardseq.nextval, #{pname}, #{price}, #{prompt}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{pass}, #{file1}, #{boardid}, sysdate, 0,#{userid},#{buy},#{buyid},sysdate)
mapper.update: update auction set buy=#{buy},buyid=#{buyid} where pnum=#{pnum}
update auction set regdate = null, buyid = #{userid},buy = #{prompt} where pnum = #{pnum}
mapper.select: select nvl(count(*),0) from auction where boardid = #{boardid}
select * from Aboardcomment where num = #{num} order by regdate desc
select * from ( select rownum rnum,a.* from ( select * from auction order by pnum desc) a) where rnum between 0 and 10
